title: Mac FPS
body: Atleast tell us something about the Sound/FPS bugs Riot. Playing without sound is terrible, please i just want to be able to play league normally :(

replies.body: I have been having this bug almost every game. I used to run the game on high graphics and had a norm of 120 fps. Now I am lucky to get 60 fps on medium , I also freeze mid teamfight. My sound cuts out aswell and it gets very static.
yeah if you turn sound off the problem goes away, but I hate playing without sound.

Hiya porlix  -

We're looking into having this resolved for Patch 6.8. Thanks for your patience!
why did they introduce sound anyways?
